```{r gender-coding}
library(magrittr)

names_sample.df <- ssa_baby_names.df %>%
  dplyr::slice_sample(n=1000, replace=TRUE)

names_sample.df %<>% 
  dplyr::bind_rows(tibble::tibble(firstname=c("Wozzleface","Hanah")))

names_sample.df %>% 
  add_gender_predictions(
              dicts = "kantro",
              col_map=c(given = "firstname") ) -> res

res
```

```{r point-estimation}

res %>% dplyr::select("og_pr_F") %>% gender_mean()
res %>% dplyr::select("og_details") %>% gender_mean(simplify_output = "tidy")

res %>% dplyr::mutate(AM=stringr::str_starts(firstname,"[A-M]")) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(AM) %>% dplyr::summarise(prop_F= mean(og_pr_F,na.rm=TRUE))

res %>% dplyr::mutate(AM=stringr::str_starts(firstname,"[A-M]")) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(AM) %>% dplyr::summarise(prop_F = gender_mean(og_pr_F,simplify_output="scalar"))

res %>% dplyr::mutate(AM=stringr::str_starts(firstname,"[A-M]")) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(AM) %>% dplyr::summarise(prop_genders = gender_mean(og_pr_F,simplify_output="row")) %>% tidyr::unpack(prop_genders)

res %>% dplyr::mutate(AM=stringr::str_starts(firstname,"[A-M]")) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(AM) %>% dplyr::summarise(prop_F = list( gender_mean(og_pr_F))) %>% tidyr::unnest(prop_F)
```

```{r estimates-with-uncertainty}

res %>% dplyr::select("og_details") %>%
  gender_estimate(simplify_output="scalar", estimates=c("mean","sd"))

res %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(AM=stringr::str_starts(firstname,"[A-M]")) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(AM) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(gender_estimates =
        gender_estimate(og_pr_F,simplify_output="row",
                        estimates=c("mean","sd"))) %>% 
  tidyr::unpack(gender_estimates)

res %>% dplyr::select("og_details") %>%
  dplyr::slice_sample(n=100) %>%
  gender_estimate()
```

try(manage_local_dicts(bizarro,name="kantro"))
manage_local_dicts(bizarro,name="bizarro", force=TRUE)
list_dicts()
show_dict("bizarro")

```{r matching-over-time}
load_dict("ssa")
show_dict("ssa") -> ssa.df
ssa.df %>% filter(given=="leslie") %>%
  filter(year<10000) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,y=pr_F)) + geom_point()

ssa.df %>% pull(given) %>% unique() %>% sample(500,replace=TRUE) -> sampleg
ssa.df %>% pull(year) %>% unique() %>% sample(500,replace=TRUE) -> samplet

mixedyear.df <- tibble(given=sampleg,year=samplet,country='US')

left_join(mixedyear.df,ssa.df %>% filter(year<10000),
          by = join_by(given,country,closest(year<=year))) %>%
      rename(year=year.x, year_l=year.y) %>%
      nest(x_l=c(-given,-starts_with("year"),-country)) %>% 
  bind_cols(
    left_join(mixedyear.df,ssa.df %>% filter(year<10000),
          by = join_by(given,country,closest(year>=year))) %>%
      rename(year=year.x, year_u=year.y) %>%
      nest(x_u=c(-given,-starts_with("year"),-country)) %>% 
      select(year_u, x_u)
  ) -> bounded_matches.df


year_interp<- function( y, y_l, y_u, df_l, df_u) {
  if (is.na(y_l) && is.na(y_u)) {
    rv <- tibble()
  } else if(is.na(y_l)) {
    rv <- df_u
  } else if(is.na(y_u)) {
    rv <- df_l
  } else {
    dft <- dplyr::bind_rows(df_l,df_u)
    rv <- dft[1,] + (((y-y_l)/(y_u-y_l)) *(dft[2,]-dft[1,]))    
    rv <- rv %>% mutate(n=as.integer(round(n)))
  }
  return(rv)
}

debug(year_interp)
year_interp( y = bounded_matches.df[[114,"year"]], 
            y_l = bounded_matches.df[[114,"year_l"]],
            y_u = bounded_matches.df[[114,"year_u"]],
            df_l = bounded_matches.df[[114,"x_l"]],
            df_u = bounded_matches.df[[114,"x_u"]]
            )

bounded_matches.df
```
